about_the_game:
Being in complete darkness, someone can't help but wonder if they're alone there. Perhaps one day, with the lights off, one might hear non-human breathing behind them. Remember your childhood nightmares; the unknown always frightened us. Perhaps here is where you'll unveil the mystery of whom you feared so fervently. Dive into another dimension with its secrets and creatures. Please, keep moving forward; stopping could mean being trapped here forever.

You'll need to descend into the complex buried deep underground to uncover what happened here years ago and what a nameless creature erased from your memory long ago.

The appearance of the local creatures can be deceptive; the most harmless-looking ones may turn out to be bloodthirsty killers.

DON’T YOU DARE STOP, AND DON'T YOU DARE TURN AROUND.

FEATURES:

  • Depending on the player’s choices, the locations and gameplay can change drastically.

  • Players often have multiple attempts to survive the challenge.

  • The game has several endings that depend entirely on the player’s choices.

  • You will encounter a variety of creatures.

  • Each creature has its own unique features that players must consider to ensure their survival

Escape from hostile creatures!

Escape from hostile creatures! You'll encounter various creatures, each requiring different actions to survive.

Some can be escaped by running away, while others can only be avoided by hiding. Some may require specific actions to save your life, or you may attempt to defeat them!

Or you might try to defeat them!

In addition, certain items found within the location can be used to stop some creatures. However, be cautious; a mistake could anger the creature..

Search for archival documents and objects to survive and unravel what happened here many years ago.

In addition to the history of this place, archival documents may reveal ways to counteract creatures. Also, be sure to collect all items found, as they may save your life.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600/AMD A6 3670K
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 650ti 1GB/ATI Radeon HD 4890 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Low setting 30 fps at 720p
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770K/Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB/RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Ultra settings 60 fps at fullHD resolution (no rt)

short_description: "Polygon of Reality" is a horror game in which you will have to unravel the mysteries of other dimensions and a research complex. Descend into the complex buried in the ground, uncover the mysteries of what happened, meet with forgotten fears and unknown creatures.
supported_languages: English, Russian, Ukrainian, Turkish, French, Italian
